articles.author: Matt Honeycombe-Foster
articles.title: Venezuela's Maduro blasts 'provocation' as UK sends warship to Guyana - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Venezuelan president promises own military exercises as dispute over oil-rich Essequibo region continues.
articles.content:
LONDON Venezuela lashed out at an act of hostile provocation after the United Kingdom deployed a navy patrol ship to Guyana amid a simmering border dispute.
The U.K. announced this week that its HMS… [+1551 chars]
